content: Face away from the cart and back in the direction you came from. There's more to explore at the moment, before you continue up to the archway you can see in the distance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'A Note on Flamlings'.
The content is as follows:
Face away from the cart and back in the direction you came from. There's more to explore at the moment, before you continue up to the archway you can see in the distance.
